model

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Piece
      • model.Item
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Assignment, Coin, ItemsComposite, Key

    public abstract class Item
extends Piece
    This class represents the abstract notion of an Item. Following the composite design pattern, this class represent the component. Items and composite items in the game must inherit methods from this class
    Author:
    Harman (singhharm1)

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class model.Piece

    • Method Detail

      • addTo

        public abstract boolean addTo(Player player,
                              Location location)
        Adds itself to the player as well all the items that are in this class' collection. Following the composite pattern, all items in the composite will be added to the player's container provided the player's container has enough space. Location field is used to determine whether or not to remove the item itself from the room.
        Parameters:
        player -
        location -
        Returns:
        boolean
